mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoPromscl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PROMSCL_SN , PROMSCL_STAT_CD , PROMSCL_COMPT_DT , PROMSCL_CNCL_DT , PROMSCL_CONFIG_YN , CHRGER_CNFIRM_YN , PROMS_TGT_NM , PROMSCL_NATION_NO , PROMSCL_AREA_NO , PROMSCL_TLOF_NO , PROMSCL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , PROMSCL_DT , PROMSCL_MEMO_CONT , CNSLT_SN , CNSLT_DETAIL_TURN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_PROMSCL WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROMSCL_SN = #{promsclSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteCsoPromscl Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM CSO_PROMSCL WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROMSCL_SN = #{promsclSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
